---
title: "nu priors"
date: "September 15, 2016"
---

```{r}
library(dplyr)

x <- seq(0, 100, length.out = 500)
par(new = FALSE)

d <- new.prior(seq(2.1, 100, length.out=1000), 10, 0.2);plot(d$x, d$y, type = "l")
plot(x, dgamma(x, shape = 2, scale = 1/0.1), type = "l", col = "blue", ylab = "")
abline(v = seq(0, 20, 5), lty = 2, col = "#00000050")

d <- rgamma(2e6, shape = 2,scale = 1/0.1)

d <- d[d>2]
sum((d<20)/length(d)) %>% round(2)
sum((d<16.75)/length(d)) %>% round(2)
sum((d<10)/length(d)) %>% round(2)
sum((d<5)/length(d)) %>% round(2)
median(d) %>% round(1)
mean(d) %>% round(1)
abline(v = median(d), lty = 3, col = "blue")

y <- dexp(x, 0.01)
par(new = TRUE)
plot(x, y, type = "l", ylim = c(0, max(y)), col = "red", axes = FALSE)
# abline(v = seq(0, 20, 5), lty = 2)

d <- rexp(2e6, 0.01)
sum((d<20)/length(d)) %>% round(2)
sum((d<10)/length(d)) %>% round(2)
sum((d<5)/length(d)) %>% round(2)
median(d) %>% round(1)
mean(d) %>% round(1)
abline(v = median(d), col = "red", lty = 3)
```
